hooklist.Description:
Synchronize the database with localization information.

When to run: Whenever the following have been added or changed:
  • Localization Strings

Synchronize the database with new service definitions, product views, account types, materialized views, enumerated types, and audit events.

When to run: Whenever the following have been added or changed:
  • Enumerated Types
  • Service Definitions
  • Product Views
  • Account Types
  • Materialized Views
  • Audit Events
Note that when a new priceable item is created, new product views are often created as well.

Synchronize the database with product catalog information.

When to run: Whenever the following have been added or changed:
  • Priceable Item Types
  • Parameter Tables
  • Counters and Counter Types
  • Adjustment Types (including Charges)
Note that when a new priceable item is created, new product views are often created as well. It may be necessary to run the "Synchronize Database" hook as well.

Synchronize the database with Security information.

When to run: Whenever capability types or security policies have changed.

Synchronize Adjustment applicability rules and reason codes.

When to run: Whenever applicability rules and reason codes have been added or changed. (Note that the Synchronize Product Catalog hook runs this hook, so if that hook has been run, this hook is not necessary)

Synchronize the database with Usage Server information.

When to run: Whenever usage server-related configuration files have been changed.

Synchronize the database with Tax Framework information.

When to run: Whenever tax framework-related configuration files have been changed.

Notify the system that configuration information has changed.

When to run: If the pipeline is running and any configuration files used by the pipeline, such as service definitions and plug-in configuration files, have changed. If services have been added, it will be necessary to restart the pipeline.

Synchronize the database with MetraNet Properties information.

When to run: Whenever a Relaxed Hierarchy rule is changed

Register all the COM objects in extensions.

When to run: A COM object has been created or modified in a platform extension.

Update Report Template Information in Crystal Enterprise internal storage.

When to run: Report Template (RPT file) has been modified on MetraNet machine or report template unique name has been modified on MetraNet machine.

Synchronize the Credit Note Template Information to the BME table.

When to run: Run this hook when you have updated credit note template information.
